info.author: Thiago Avelino
info.description:
django-tags
=============

``django-tags`` a simpler approach to tagging with Django.  Add ``"tags"`` to your
``INSTALLED_APPS`` then just add a TaggableManager to your model and go::

    from django.db import models

    from tags.field import TagField

    class Food(models.Model):
        # ... fields here

        tags = TagField('Tags')


Tags will show up for you automatically in forms and the admin.

``django-tags`` requires Django 1.3 or greater.
info.name: django-tags
info.summary: django-tags is a reusable Django application for simple tags.
info.html_description:
django-tags a simpler approach to tagging with Django. Add "tags" to your INSTALLED_APPS then just add a TaggableManager to your model and go:

from django.db import models

from tags.field import TagField

class Food(models.Model):
    # ... fields here

    tags = TagField('Tags')

Tags will show up for you automatically in forms and the admin.

django-tags requires Django 1.3 or greater.
